trigger.description: Low free disk space on {HOSTNAME} volume /
Low number of free inodes on {HOSTNAME} volume /
trigger.expression: {Template_Solaris10_SSH_Passphrase:ssh.run[Free number of inodes on <ufs mount point> in %,,{$SSH_PORT},{$SSH_ENCODING}].last(0)}<10

trigger.description: Incoming errors on interface eth0 was increased on {HOSTNAME}
Processor load is too high on {HOSTNAME}
Outgoing errors on interface eth0 was increased on {HOSTNAME}

item.key: ssh.run[Free number of inodes on <ufs mount point> in %,,{$SSH_PORT},{$SSH_ENCODING}]
item.description: Free number of inodes on <ufs mount point> in %

item.params: /usr/sbin/swap -l|awk 'BEGIN { count = 0; } NR>=2 { count += $5; } END { print count; }'
LANG=C who -b|awk '{for (i = 4; i <= NF; i++ ) if ( i != NF ) {printf $i" "} else {printf $i}}'
/usr/bin/ps ax| /usr/bin/awk 'BEGIN { count = 0; } $3 == "O" { count++; } END { print count; }'
/usr/sbin/swap -l|awk 'BEGIN { count = 0; } NR>=2 { count += $4; } END { print count; }'

item.key: ssh.run[Free number of inodes on <ufs mount point>,,{$SSH_PORT},{$SSH_ENCODING}]
item.description: Free number of inodes on <ufs mount point>

item.key: ssh.run[Maximum memory allowed in buffer cache,,{$SSH_PORT},{$SSH_ENCODING}]
item.description: Maximum memory allowed in buffer cache
